name: Wish You Were Here
intro: "Wish You Were Here" is a song by Canadian recording artist Avril Lavigne, taken as the third single from her fourth studio album Goodbye Lullaby. Written by Lavigne with its producers Max Martin and Shellback, and produced by the latter two.
